name: Autumn Collection
description: As the leaves turn and those darker nights draw in, we are beginning to ready ourselves for the cooler days ahead. Let us take you through our pick of the best that Scotland has to offer. Our superb selection of stylish tweeds, comforting lambwool and the earthy tones of Reproduction tartans will get you in the mood for September and beyond.

name: New Products
description: A selection of our latest offerings.

name: Personalised Products
description: Discover a unique collection of personalised Scottish products. Tailor each item with your choice of tartans, clan crests, silhouette designs and more to create a truly one-of-a-kind piece that reflects your own family roots.

name: Spring Collection
description: From skirts to shawls, every piece in our spring collection is crafted to help you make the most of the season’s beauty, so you can step into nature with confidence and style.

name: Summer Collection
description: From t-shirts to swimwear, our summer collection showcases tartan and clan crest designs with vibrant style. Crafted for beach days, picnics, or active adventures, every piece—from shorts and leggings to hats, bandanas, and towels - lets you embrace the season’s warmth with a splash of Scottish charm.

name: Antler and Horn
description: Handcrafted antler and horn items: traditional Scottish spoons, cups, bottle openers and more -  celebrating natural elegance and heritage.

name: Burns
description: Our curated collection of authentic products with a Robert Burns motif or that are popular for Scottish-themed celebrations such as Burns Night.

name: Cashmere
description: Cashmere from the finest producers in Scotland, plus the best from overseas. For genuine Scottish cashmere of the very highest quality, filter by 'Made in Britain'.

name: Irish
description: Traditional kilts, formal jackets, and accessories crafted for those who take pride in their Irish heritage. Explore Irish tartans, Shamrock-inspired gifts, and high-quality pieces to complete your look for any occasion.

name: Knitwear
description: Superb knitwear from Scotland for men, women, and children in pure new wool, genuine Scottish Cashmere, and other quality fibres. We even offer sweaters and cardigans hand-knitted locally the old-fashioned way on knitting needles - just like your granny used to make you!

name: Knitwear for Children
description: Beautiful hand-knitted jerseys and cardigans for children.

name: Knitwear for Men
description: A collection of the finest knitwear, from hand knitted pure new wool cardigans to quality cashmere jumpers, sourced from Scotland's leading suppliers.

name: Knitwear for Women
description: Our beautiful knitwear collection features both traditional hand-made jumpers and contemporary knitwear designs. Luxurious cashmere or cosy pure new wool, our sweaters look great and will keep you warm.

name: Tweed
description: The finest Scottish tweed products, direct from Scotland, the home of authentic tweed. We supply both custom-produced garments for men and women made to order in your choice of tweed fabrics, and hand-selected tweed goods from traditional Scottish producers.

name: Weddings
description: Everything you need to have the perfect, traditional Scottish wedding. You can even design your own commemorative tartan for garments and gifts, blending two family plaids into one.

name: Bridal Wear
description: Who says a bride can only wear white? There's nothing more beautiful than tartan to celebrate your family heritage on the big day.

name: Ceremony
description: The big day is approaching faster than you thought but don't worry we are here to help with a selection of finishing touches for the perfect ceremony.

name: Groom Wear
description: At Scottish weddings it's not only the bride who can dress to impress. We've by far the world's largest choice of tartan kilt outfits, to celebrate your old family as well as your new one!

name: Wedding Party
description: Luxury Scottish Highland wear for groomsmen and bridesmaids as well as you entire wedding party. Everything you need to throw the perfect Scottish Wedding!

name: Wedding Presents
description: Honour the couple’s love with exquisite Scottish wedding gifts, steeped in tradition. From tartan keepsakes to handcrafted quaichs and commemorative treasures, each gift weaves Highland romance into their forever story.

name: Wedding Receptions
description: From ribbons to fabrics table runners to quaichs and more - we have everything you need to throw the perfect Scottish wedding reception.

name: Welsh
description: Embrace Welsh heritage with our selection of kilts, formalwear, and accessories. From traditional Welsh tartans to dragon-inspired jewellery, ties, and scarves, find everything you need to celebrate your roots in style.

name: Products
description: A huge range of bespoke mens wear, women's wear, children's wear, and homewares that we'll make for you in ANY suitable fabric from the world's largest range of tartans and tweeds - including your own designs!

name: Children
description: From clothing and accessories to cuddly toys, our children and babies range offers high quality Scottish products that are sure to put a smile on your wee one’s face.

name: Baby
description: Baby’s luxury Scottish accessories. Available in quality cashmere, our blankets are the perfect addition to any cot.

name: Boys Clothing
description: At Clan we offer clothing to suit all occasions for your little man.

name: Boys Kilts & Highlandwear
description: Special event coming up? From jackets to vest, from sporrans to brogues, at CLAN we have everything you need for your wee man’s first kilt outfit.

name: Children's Hats & Scrunchies
description: Give your little ones a touch of Scottish tradition with our charming selection of children's hats and hair accessories, available in a wide range of tartans.

name: Children's Jewellery
description: Put a smile on your little girl’s face with our collection of cute necklaces and bracelets. At Clan we offer only high quality Scottish jewellery for your wee one.

name: Girls Clothing
description: At Clan we offer clothing to suit all occasions for your little lady.

name: Soft Toys
description: Meet our range of gorgeous stuffed animals. They can be accessorised with scarfs and tammies in your choice of tartan.

name: Anniversary Gifts
description: Show your significant other you care with our selection of traditional Scottish anniversary gifts.

name: Birthday Gifts
description: Traditional, quality Scottish birthday gifts for that special someone!

name: Christening Gifts
description: Luxury Scottish Christening gifts - to be treasured forever.

name: Christmas Gift Guide
description: Christmas is a time to be with family. So celebrate your family roots with a gift from your loved one's home in Scotland.

name: Homeware
description: From our traditional tartan tableware to gorgeous glassware, we have beautiful additions for every room in your home. Choose from clan crest designs, our wide range of tartans, or opt for a lovely cashmere throw to add a little piece of Scotland to your home.

name: Engagement Gifts
description: Jewellery, tartan, cashmere and more - luxury Scottish gifts for a special couple.

name: Gifts for Babies
description: Traditional Scottish gifts for babies. Cuddly toys, cashmere blankets, highland coo booties and more!

name: Gifts for Children
description: Traditional Scottish gifts for the wee ones! Perfect for Christmas, birthdays and more.

name: Gifts for Couples
description: Traditional, quality gifts for couples.

name: Gifts for Her
description: Luxury Scottish gifts for the special woman in your life - perfect for Christmas, birthdays, weddings and more!

name: Gifts for Him
description: Men are notoriously difficult to buy for but worry not, we're here to help with our 'Gifts for Him' gift guide. Get him something he'll really love.

name: Gifts for Pets
description: Luxury Scottish gifts for pets. Traditional, quality presents for your furry friend!

name: New Home Gifts
description: Give someone a true Scottish welcome to their new home with our selection of housewarming gifts.

name: Retirement Gifts
description: Traditional, quality retirement gifts for a treasured colleague.

name: Valentine's Day Gifts
description: Celebrate your Scottish heritage with your loved one. We have the perfect range of gifts for Valentine's Day.

name: Vouchers & Gift Sets
description: Not sure what to get your loved one? CLAN Gift Certificates let your loved ones choose their own perfect present.

name: Wedding Gifts
description: Traditional, quality Wedding gifts for a special couple.

name: Bed & Bath
description: Pamper yourself with our range of bath and body products.

name: Cutlery & Utensils
description: Cutlery sets traditionally make a great wedding gift, and we have a range of unusual items that can often be hard to find. Our selection of knives, forks and spoons made from materials such as oxhorn and antler are traditional yet unique and have been handcrafted in Scotland by expert craftsmen.

name: Drinking Vessels
description: Our collection of drinking vessels includes plain styles, clan crested, emblem, tartan and commemorative designs, many with optional engraving - all helping you to create the perfect personal gift for your loved ones.

name: Coasters
description: Bring a touch of Scotland to your table with our exquisite range of tartan and clan coasters.  Choose your family tartan or create your own design to make these your own. Durable and stylish, these coasters make an ideal gift for any occasion or a beautiful addition to your own decor.

name: Cups
description: Choose from Ox horn drinking horns or pewter drinking cups and add a touch of heritage to your drinks.

name: Drinking horns
description: Our collection of drinking vessels includes plain styles, clan crested, emblem, tartan and commemorative designs, many with optional engraving - all helping you to create the perfect personal gift for your loved ones.

name: Flasks
description: If you like your dram on the move, then we have a wide selection of hip flasks. In various sizes, and curved to fit the body neatly, they are ideal for enjoying a dram whilst shooting, fishing and engaging in other outdoor pursuits.

name: Glasses
description: After a hard days work, it's great to unwind with a wee dram, and we have a selection of glasses for you to relax with.  Our whisky glasses come in a variety of styles, from traditional tot glasses, to tumblers with Celtic, Charles Rennie Mackintosh and clan crest designs. If beer is your tipple, we have a wide range of British pint tankards, made from pewter, which can also be engraved with a special message. And if wine or champagne is your preferred drink, we have a stunning range of delicate goblets and flutes that will be perfect for toasting the bells at Hogmanay, the bride and groom, or at any other special celebration.

name: Tankards
description: Enjoy your drinks in true Scottish style with one of these traditional Celtic tankards. Available in a wide array of clan crests, MacKintosh and Celtic designs these are a must have for any true Scotsman!

name: Jugs & Decanters
description: A fabulous range of Celtic-themed jugs and decanters. Choose from a captivating range of designs, and add a new Celtic touch to your drinking sessions.

name: Quaichs
description: Pewter is the most common metal to use for manufacturing quaichs so it is not surprising we have an extensive range to choose from. Our collection includes plain styles, clan crested, emblem, tartan and commemorative quaichs to suit almost every occasion. With the option of engraving and setting on a plinth, these would make ideal gifts or presentation prizes.

name: Table Cloths & Settings
description: Whether  for a dinner party or Burns night, or to add a Scottish theme to your big day, our range of tartan table cloths and settings will be much admired.  All in a wide range of tartans.

name: Home Accessories
description: If your home needs a few finishing touches then take a browse through the range of ornaments and art on offer.

name: Jewellery
description: Choose something special from our broad selection of jewellery.

name: Candles & Holders
description: Nothing adds atmosphere to a room like some beautiful burning candles and our range of holders and burners are sure to add to the effect. Our ceramic burners have been handmade and handpainted in Scotland and make a wonderful gift. Our pewter candle holders, featuring Celtic designs, are available singularly or in sets, and also have matching snuffers, while our candlesticks show both the elegance of MacKintosh's designs as well as Celtic charm. Or if you're looking for something with a personal touch, our personalised tartan wedding candle set is highly unusual. The set of candles, which are available in different sizes, can be personalised with one of our range of 12000 tartans - a unique idea.

name: Pictures
description: You'll never feel far from Scotland with our beautiful range of pictures.

name: Plaques
description: Luxury Scottish Clan Crest Wall Plaques available in a wide range of crests and tartans. Choose between a dark and light wood finish to match furniture in your room. Made in Scotland by traditional leading producers.

name: Stationery
description: You'll want to save this stationery for writing that special letter or card to loved ones - they'll adore the superior quality and traditional charm!

name: Trinket Boxes
description: Lots of little things to hold lots of little things. Useful little trinket boxes, in a wide range of appealing Celtic and MacKintosh designs. Ideal little gifts for friends and family.

name: Vases & Jugs
description: Our range of vases encompasses six different categories, each with different styles but all with the high quality that you'd expect from Scotweb.

name: Pets
description: We believe that EVERY member of the family should be able to share in your heritage! Check out our growing range for your animal companions.

name: Sewing & Crafts
description: We have great value 1kg tartan oddment bags, cute tartan ribbons and bows, unique buttons and more - perfect for crafters, hobbyists and dressmakers.

name: Embroidery Kits
description: Luxury Scottish embroidery kits. From Old Scottish County Map cross stitch kits to Charles Rennie Mackintosh, there’s something for everyone. The perfect gift for Scottish crafts and embroidery!

name: Fabrics
description: Luxury tartan fabric from swatches to meter lengths. Find your family tartan today or choose from our selection of Scottish tweed. Perfect for garments to craft projects.

name: Fabric Lengths
description: Luxury tartan fabric lengths. Find your family tartan today or choose from our selection of Scottish tweed. Perfect for garments to craft projects.

name: Swatches
description: Tartan and tweed fabrics cut to any length (yards or metres) in our unrivaled choice of materials and patterns. Or request a swatch to try before you buy.

name: Haberdashery
description: Luxury Scottish buttons and ribbons - add a touch of heritage to your craft project!

name: Buttons & Zip Pulls
description: Luxury Scottish Haberdashery from ox horn buttons to stag antler zip pulls. Add a touch of heritage to your craft project.

name: Ribbon
description: Tie that perfect gift up in a bow with this selection of tartan ribbons! Add some traditional flare to any occasion or special design.

name: Soft Furnishings
description: Our selection of home furnishings can bring the finishing touch to any room, adding a subtle touch of tartan, or a splash of colour.

name: Blankets
description: Add a finishing touch to your home with one of our carefully selected blankets. We have chosen to offer a small selection of great quality blankets, made form the finest materials, just for you.

name: Cushions
description: Give your furniture the perfect finishing touch. This unique range of tartan cushions adds a personalized touch to any room, making a house a home.

name: Rugs
description: Add a finishing touch to your home with an item from our selection of rugs.  Made from some of the softest materials around and available in a huge range of colours and styles, they will brighten up any home.

name: Throws
description: A throw can bring the finishing touch to a room, adding a subtle touch of tartan, or a splash of colour.  But they also serve other purposes too, and can be used as picnic rugs on a sunny day, and as blankets to ward off the cold Scottish weather. We have a large range of throws on offer, in a variety of materials and colours, as well as in a huge array of tartans. Our lambswool throws are soft and cosy, and will brighten up any room, while our ultra-soft and luxurious cashmere throws are made in Scotland from the best cashmere there is. They will last a lifetime if looked after correctly. Our selection also includes a range of limited edition collections, which change every year, as well as a choice of Celtic designs.

name: Towels
description: Whether you're drying off after a dip in the bracing North Sea or adding a touch of tartan to your kitchen, our towels embody the warmth and elegance of Scotland.

name: Books
description: Learn about your family, clan, and cultural heritage with our range of Scottish books

name: Novelties
description: Something different to bring a spot of Scottish entertainment to your night.

name: Soft Toys
description: Meet Fergus, Hamish, Thistle and Bella -  and the rest of our range of gorgeous stuffed animals, adored by kids both big and small.  They can be accessorised with scarfs and tammies in your choice of tartan.

name: Bracelets & Bangles
description: Our range of bracelets come from both Scotland and Ireland with styles relating to both these nations. Superior craftsmanship blended with pure precious metals make our range of bracelets and bangles hard to beat.

name: Bangles
description: Luxury Scottish Bangles. Available in silver and gold in a variety of styles. Choose to compliment with precious stones and contemporary designs from thistles, luckenbooths and clan crest options. The perfect gift for a loved one or simply treat yourself.

name: Bracelets
description: Luxury Scottish Bracelets. Available in silver and gold in a variety of styles. Handcrafted on Orkney by traditional skilled craftsmen. Choose to compliment with precious stones and contemporary designs from thistles, luckenbooths and clan crest options. The perfect gift for a loved one - or simply treat yourself.

name: Brooches & Pins
description: Our range of brooches and pins fit a variety of uses, from livening up a plain cardigan to attaching sashes and plaids in a highland outfit.

name: Toys & Books
description: Toys and books for children and adults.

name: Charms
description: Our range of single charms are made from sterling silver that has been handcrafted on the Scottish island of Orkney.  They are a beautiful reminder of Scotland, or a thoughtful gift to show someone that you care.  They make a unique gift that will last throughout the years.

name: Cufflinks, Tie Pins & Slides
description: Our tie accessories are the perfect gift. Available in pewter, gold or silver, they're available in a number of traditional Scottish designs to complement your outfit.

name: Earrings
description: We have a superb range of drop and stud earrings, in a huge variety of designs, in both contemporary and traditional styles. Our earrings are made from the finest silver and gold and have been hand crafted by skilled craftsmen.

name: Drop Earrings
description: Our beautiful  range of drop earrings can be worn on almost any occasion.  Whatever your preferred style, we're sure to have something suitable. For earrings with a hint of Scotland, we have a collection inspired by the beauty of the Scottish thistle, as well as Charles Rennie Mackintosh designs.  We also have a range of beautiful Celtic-inspired choices, featuring the luckenbooth motif and the trinity knot amongst others. Or for a touch of the Emerald isle, our beautiful Claddagh earrings, symbolising love, friendship and loyalty are available in a range of traditional and contemporary designs. And for earrings that will never go out of style, browse through our range of diamond drop earrings, or our stone earrings, handcrafted from natural materials.

name: Stud Earrings
description: Practical enough to wear everyday, but equally designed to make an impact, our beautiful range of stud earrings are sure to impress. Just like our selection of drop earrings, the stud earrings are available in a variety of different styles, influenced by both Scotland and Ireland and all made from the finest of materials. Our earrings have been handcrafted by the finest craftsmen and will be enjoyed for years to come.

name: Keyrings
description: A Scottish keyring is a great gift for your loved ones. Help them show off their heritage everyday.

name: Necklaces
description: Our beautiful range of necklaces team contemporary designs with expert craftsmanship.  They are available in a huge selection of styles to add the finishing touch to any outfit.

name: Pendants
description: Our pendants are usually available on a 16 inch chain, unless stated otherwise, although if you would prefer a longer chain then please do ask us. Our beautiful range also has matching items such as earrings and bracelets, and if you can't find what you're looking for -  please get in touch.

name: Rings
description: We have a beautiful range of rings to choose from, for both men and women, made from either silver or gold and crafted by some of Scotland's leading jewellers.

name: Watches
description: We have a beautiful range of ladies and gents watches, in a variety of Celtic-inspired designs. Our Charles Rennie Mackintosh watches continue to be popular, whilst our range of Irish watches evoke the spirit of the Emerald Isle. For something more unusual, we have a beautiful choice of pocket-watches in a variety of styles, as well as Rambler watches, complete with pouch. All our watches are top quality and are fully-returnable and guaranteed.

name: Pocket Watches
description: An inspiring collection of these legendary timepieces. Bring out your inner gent!

name: Kilts & Highlandwear
description: Luxury highlandwear, formal dress, made-to-measure jackets, kilts and accessories. Our selection will ensure you look your best. Our kilt and trews outfits help you customise a complete look for any occasion.

name: Accessory Gift Sets
description: Hand-crafted to the highest standards, our accessory gift sets make the perfect, heartfelt gift. Treat someone special to one of our clan crest kilt accessory sets, a tie gift set in their own tartan, or one of our pocket watch and cuff links sets.

name: Belts & Buckles
description: Scottish-crafted belts and buckles to complement your semi-formal or casual kilt outfit. (Not commonly worn with a Prince Charlie jacket.)

name: Belt Buckles
description: The buckle offers another opportunity to customise your kilt outfit. Many of our buckles have matching sporrans, kilt pins and sgian dhus to complete the look.

name: Kilt Belts
description: Complement your kilt with one of our luxury belts available in a wide range of traditional and Celtic designs.

name: Brogues
description:
A wide selection of brogues in various styles, fittings and colours.

Please take a look at our sizing charts for international conversions.

name: Boots
description: Our luxury Ghillie Boots are the modern alternative to your traditional kilt shoe. Perfect for walks, highland games or semi-formal events. Match with Highland dress - or go rogue and take advantage of the versatility of these beautifully crafted boots.

name: Daywear Brogues
description: Our luxury traditional Day wear Brogues are the perfect finish to your kilt outfit. Available in a wide selection of sizes and colours to suit any Highland dress.

name: Dress Brogues
description: Our luxury traditional Dress Brogues are the perfect finish to your kilt outfit. Available in a wide selection of sizes and colours to suit any Highland dress.

name: Ghillie Brogues
description:
A wide selection of brogues in various styles, fittings and colours.

Please check take a look at our sizing charts for international conversions.

name: Laces & Tassels
description: Our luxury Laces and Tassels for Ghillie Brogues are the perfect addition to you kilt outfit. Spruce up older brogues or keep as a handy replacement. We offer the traditional extra length laces with luxury leather tassels for that full Highland flair!

name: Caps & Cap Badges
description:
Available in hundreds of different Irish, Welsh and Scottish Clans, our badges are perfect for pinning to your cap, lapel or for holding your tartan plaids in place.

We also have a selection of flat and quarter caps available in a variety of tweeds and thousands of tartans, as well as baseball caps, which are available in 484 tartans.

name: Cap Badges
description: Our luxury cap badges are available in hundreds of clan crests from Scotland and Ireland to Wales. Our pins are the perfect addition to any highland dress. Simply pin to your cap or use to hold your plaid in place.

name: Caps
description: A range of hats for every occasion. Our tartan caps are available in thousands of fabrics, or better still, create your own using our tartan design service.

name: Homeware
description: From our traditional tartan tableware to gorgeous glassware.

name: Scarves
description: Beautiful scarves in various tartans and styles.

name: Fly Plaids & Plaid Brooches
description: Special event coming up? The fly plaid is worn formally over the shoulder, held in position by your choice of badge, brooch or pin, and  is normally worn at more formal occasions. At Clan we offer a a variety of fly plaids with a choice of thousands of tartans so that you can be sure to show off your heritage.

name: Fly Plaids
description: The fly plaid is a formal accessory worn over the shoulder and held in place by your choice of badge, brooch or pin.

name: Plaid Brooches
description: Made to withstand the weight of a fly plaid, these ornately detailed and crafted brooches are durable and available in a wide range of designs and clan crests.

name: Kilt Carriers & Hangers
description: A selection of handy hangers, outfit carriers and kilt rolls to keep your kilt outfits in tip top condition, in your wardrobe or whilst on the move.

name: Kilt Flashes & Garter Ties
description: Kilt flashes and garter ties can be made in the same tartan as your kilt. A simple alternative is to choose a block colour to contrast or complement the rest of your kilt outift.

name: Kilt Jackets & Vests
description: Jackets & vests in barathea or tweed, in a range of formal, semi-formal, and casual styles to suit your look or event. For both casual and formal wear, our kilt jackets and vests are all authentically Made in Scotland.

name: Kilt Jackets
description: For both casual and formal wear, our stunning kilt jackets are of an unbeatable quality.

name: Spare Buttons
description: Unique buttons in various sizes for formal or casual dress, including staghorn and Prince Charlie styles.

name: Vests (Waistcoats)
description: Tartan, tweed, or barathea waistcoats and vests, for either wearing with highland wear or simply as a style statement.

name: Kilt Outfits
description: Complete kilt packages to suit all occasions, whatever your budget. You can add, change, or remove items for the perfect look - all authentically made in Scotland.

name: Casual Kilt Outfits
description: Traditional, luxury casual Kilt outfit packages to every occasion and every budget. Made in Scotland by industry experts with only the finest locally resourced fabrics.

name: Formal Kilt Outfits
description: Traditional, luxury kilt outfit packages to suit formal occasions with your budget in mind. Made in Scotland by industry experts with only the finest locally resourced fabrics.

name: Semi-formal Kilt Outfits
description: Traditional, luxury kilt outfit packages to suit semi-formal occasions with your budget in mind. Made in Scotland by industry experts with only the finest locally resourced fabrics.

name: Kilt Pins
description: A kilt pin is a decorative brooch that weighs down the lower apron of the kilt. It should not be pinned through into the fabric behind. At Clan we offer a superb range of kilt pins from the classic safety pin to intricate clan crests and jewel encrusted pins.

name: Animal Kilt Pins
description: Our luxury Animal Kilt Pins are the perfect accessory for any kilt outfit.

name: Axe or Shield Kilt Pins
description: Our luxury Axe and Shield Kilt Pins are the perfect accessory for any kilt outfit.

name: Celtic Kilt Pins
description: Our Celtic kilt pins are expertly crafted and available in a variety of traditional and intricate designs.

name: Cross Kilt Pins
description: A fine collection of expertly crafted kilt pins in a variety of 'cross' designs, from the Celtic cross to the St. Andrew's cross.

name: Dart Kilt Pins
description: Our luxury Dart Kilt Pins are the perfect accessory for any kilt outfit.

name: Instrument Kilt Pins
description: Our luxury Instrument Kilt Pins are the perfect accessory for any kilt outfit.

name: Irish Kilt Pins
description: A collection of expertly crafted Irish kilt pins with intricate detailing and a range of designs.

name: Jewel Kilt Pins
description: Our luxury Jewel Kilt Pins are the perfect accessory for any kilt outfit.

name: Rennie Mackintosh Kilt Pins
description: Our luxury Charles Rennie Mackintosh Kilt Pins are the perfect accessory for any kilt outfit. Handcrafted in Scotland, our traditional kilt pins are made using only the finest materials.

name: Simple Safety Kilt Pins
description: The tradition of wearing a kilt pin started with this simple safety pin (diaper pin) style kilt pin.

name: Sword Kilt Pins
description: A collection of expertly crafted sword kilt pins with intricate detailing and a wide range of designs.

name: Thistle Kilt Pins
description: A collection of expertly crafted kilt pins in a variety of intricate thistle designs.

name: Kilts
description: At CLAN we offer a wide range of tartans to suit every occasion. We understand the importance of heritage, tradition and authenticity and that's why all our kilts are made in Scotland by the world's top kilt makers.

name: Casual Kilts
description: The casual kilt can is suitable for almost any occasion and can be dressed up or down. The casual kilt is lighter and more affordable than the traditional 8 yard kilt.

name: Traditional 8 Yard Kilts
description: Traditional 8 yard kilts, made with pure wool tartans, from only the best mills. We supply almost any commercially-available tartan, in a range of weights and other materials.

name: Sgian Dubhs
description: The Sgian Dubh is an important part of the traditional Highland Dress. It is usually tucked into the hose of the right leg.

name: Antler Handle Sgian Dubhs
description: Our sgian dubhs are available in stag and ox horn and are all crafted using traditional methods.  These materials are naturally sourced and we ensure that no harm has come to any animal in the process.

name: Resin Handle Sgian Dubhs
description: A sgian dubh is worn semi-concealed in the hose on the right side of the right leg. All of our models come complete with a real blade unless specified otherwise.

name: Wood Handle Sgian Dubhs
description: Our sgian dubhs are all crafted using traditional methods and naturally sourced materials.

name: Socks & Hose
description: A selection of plain colours plus full tartan hose or diced hose. We also offer a made to order service to match your hose to your tartan, available in small volumes.

name: Country Socks
description: Warm and cosy woollen country socks.

name: Kilt Hose
description: Knitted, woven, chequred, coloured - our range has the lot.

name: Socks
description: Our luxury men’s socks are the perfect accessory to any kilt outfit. Choose from plain colours, diced, knitted and more to suit any highland dress. Alternatively, wear your luxury socks to match your country wear,

name: Sporrans & Straps
description: Choose from our extensive range of authentic formal, semi-dress or day-wear sporrans to complete your kilt outfit. All crafted in Scotland by skilled craftsmen, we never supply copycat imports.

name: Daywear Sporrans
description: Daywear sporrans are generally worn with a casual kilt outfit to events such as ceilidhs, sporting matches, parties or simply day to day.

name: Dress Sporrans
description: Worn as formal wear to evening events, a dress sporran finishes a Prince Charlie, Argyll or Braemar kilt outfit perfectly.

name: Semi-Dress Sporrans
description: A semi-dress sporran is the most flexible all-rounder. Due to its half-formal appearance, the semi-dress sporran is the ideal accessory for those who require a kilt for both evening and day wear.

name: Sporran Flasks
description: Flasks to hold a warming nip that pop discretely inside your sporran for those long days in the field.

name: Sporran Straps
description: Traditional, luxury Sporran Straps to hold your sporran and complete your kilt outfit. Suitable for all events. All crafted in Scotland by skilled craftsmen using only the finest locally resourced materials.

name: Trews
description: A wonderful alternative to the kilt; our trews are made to measure in Scotland, and available in your choice of tartan.

name: Trews Outfits
description: Complete trews outfit packages, that we've created to suit all occasions, whatever your budget. You can add, change, or remove items too, for the perfect look - all authentically Made in Scotland.

name: Formal Trews Outfits
description: Everything you need to create the perfect formal trews outfit. Input your measurements and choose from a large range of tartans and accessories.

name: Semi-formal Trews Outfits
description: Everything you need to create the perfect semi-formal trews outfit. Input your measurements and choose from a large range of tartans and accessories.

name: Women's Highlandwear
description: Traditional Highland Dress is not just for the gents. At Clan we offer a unique selection of Highlandwear for women including kilted skirts and tartan sashes so that you can proudly display your heritage.

name: Formal Skirts
description: Luxury women’s formal kilted skirts available in thousands of tartans. The perfect highland dress alternative for any formal event!

name: Tartan Sashes
description: Accessorise with a splash of historic drama, for the most formal of occasions.

name: Men
description: Formal wear, casual wear and accessories for men. Authentically crafted to the highest traditional standards from tweeds, tartans, cashmere and other quality Scottish materials.

name: Accessory Gift Sets
description: Hand-crafted to the highest standards, our accessory gift sets make the perfect, heartfelt gift. Treat someone special to one of our clan crest kilt accessory sets or a tie gift set in their own tartan.

name: Bags
description: A collection of stylish, practical bags available in a wide range of tartans and designs.

name: Braces
description: Men's wool and silk tartan braces available in a wide range of tartan.

name: Belts
description: Men’s luxury leather belts made from quality leather to ensure we offer only luxury accessories for your outfit. Made in Scotland.

name: Braces - Men's Suspenders
description: Choose from our range of quality braces available in silk and wool.

name: Cuff Links & Jewellery
description: Men's luxury cuff links and jewellery. Choose from our range of traditional cuff links, lapel and tie pins to complete your outfit.

name: Cufflinks & Accessories
description: Finish off that look with our range of the finest Scottish accessories for men including our wide selection of lapel pins and cufflinks.

name: Lapel and Tie Accessories
description: The perfect accessory to any outfit. Made in Scotland by expert traditional hand crafters.

name: Tie Slides & Pins
description: Guaranteed to keep your tie looking sharp and lying flat.

name: Zip Pulls
description: Luxury zip pulls available in a natural stag antler finish. Add this traditional touch to any outfit for a traditional Scottish look. Made and sourced in Scotland to bring you an authentic, luxury accessory.

name: Cummerbunds
description: Men's luxury tartan cummerbunds available in pure new wool and silk. Cummerbunds are a fantastic alternative to a waistcoat and these wide, pleated belts can be the finishing touch to your kilt outfit or evening suit.

name: Gloves
description: Keep yourself cosy with our beautiful cashmere gloves, available in a selection of colours.

name: Hats & Caps
description: A range of hats for every occasion including traditional dress caps and winter woolens. Our luxury tartan hats are available in thousands of fabrics, making them the perfect accessory to showcase your heritage.

name: Baseball Caps
description: Men’s luxury tartan baseball caps available in a wide range of tartans. This is the perfect way to add a modern touch of tartan to your outfit!

name: Deerstalker Hats
description: The perfect country wear accessory. Available in tweed or with a fur trim - make this hat your own!

name: Flat Caps
description: For everyday wear or to add a twist to an outfit, our range of classic country flat caps are available in a huge range of tartans.

name: Highlandwear Caps
description: From Glengarry to Balmoral hats, there is something for every event. Choose from our wide range of tartans to show off your heritage!

name: Knitted Hats
description: From chunky knits to quality cashmere, these luxury hats are the perfect gift for him. Choose from our large colour range or opt for a fair isle pattern to make this a truly personal accessory.

name: Tam O'Shanter Caps
description: Men’s traditional luxury Tam O’ Shanter hats. We offer this classic Tammy hat in a wide range of tartans so you can show off your heritage.

name: Town & Country Hats
description: Men’s luxury traditional town and country hats. Available in a wide selection of tweeds

name: Jackets & Coats
description: Our collection of coats and jackets have been carefully selected from some of the UK and Ireland's most accomplished suppliers.

name: Capes
description: A stylish and practical range of piper's capes, dress capes and rain capes to keep you dry, whatever the occasion.

name: Coats
description: Quality overcoats in a variety of styles to protect your from the elements.

name: Jackets
description: Our collection of coats and jackets have been carefully selected from some of the UK and Ireland's most accomplished suppliers.

name: Knitwear
description: A collection of men's luxury knitwear. From pure new wool cardigans to quality cashmere sweaters, our men's knitwear is sourced from expert producers to bring you a truly traditional garment.

name: Cardigans
description: A collection of luxury cashmere and pure new wool cardigans from Scotland's top suppliers.

name: Sleeveless Sweaters
description: Quality cashmere and lambswool sleeveless sweaters produced by Scotland's leading suppliers.

name: Sweaters
description: A collection of luxury cashmere and pure new wool sweaters from Scotland's top suppliers.

name: Leisurewear
description: Our premium range of leisurewear, including stylish T-shirts and hoodies - many available in personalised tartans or featuring your clan crest. Perfect for comfort and unique expression, our collection blends quality and tradition with a modern twist.

name: Pocket Squares
description: Our silk and wool pocket squares are the perfect accessory for your jacket and are available in a wide variety of tartans.

name: Scarves
description: Keep yourself (or your loved ones) cosy all year round with our luxury men's scarves. Available in cashmere, wool, and silk with your choice of tartan, colour, or traditional Scottish pattern.

name: Shirts
description: Men's dress and casual shirts. Choose from our Jacobite, wing collar and tattersall shirts to complete any outfit.

name: Shoes & Boots
description: Men's luxury shoes & boots, including our tartan Country and Ghillie Brogues which can be made in your choice of tartan.

name: Boots
description: Our luxury Ghillie Boots are the modern alternative to your traditional kilt shoe. Perfect for walks, highland games or semi-formal events. Match with highland dress or go rogue and take advantage of the versatility of these beautifully crafted boots.

name: Daywear Shoes
description: Our selection of Ghillie brogues are suitable for every daytime event.

name: Footwear Accessories
description: Spruce up older brogues with our brogue laces and tassels, and use our handy shoehorns to put your brogues on with ease.

name: Kilt Shoes
description: Men’s Luxury shoes, ghillie brogues and boots are available in various styles. Our selection of Ghillie brogues are suitable for every event from formal black tie and weddings to day wear.

name: Socks
description: Our luxury men’s socks are the perfect accessory to any kilt outfit. Choose from plain colours, diced, knitted and more to suit any highland dress.

name: Suits
description: Our suits are expertly hand-made in Scotland. Choose from thousands of tartans to create a unique, individual presence in our three piece suits.

name: Ties & Cravats
description: Men's ties, cravats and bow ties available in a selection of tartans and silk. Our Luxury range can be made in any existing tartan or, alternatively, you can design your own tartan to really personalise your accessories!

name: Bow Ties
description: Brighten up a black tie event with a bow tie in your family tartan.  Choose from thousands of fabrics or even design your own using our tartan design service.

name: Cravats
description: Our cravats come in wool, satin or silk. Choose from thousands of tartans or alternatively, create your own using our tartan design service.

name: Neck Ties
description: Our neck ties are available in wool and silk and come in many styles.  A selection of our ties can be made in any existing tartan.  Alternatively, you can create your own tartan using our tartan design service.

name: Rouches
description: Our rouches come in wool, satin or silk. Choose from thousands of tartans or alternatively, create your own using our tartan design service.

name: Trousers & Trews
description: Our made to measure trousers and trews are available in a large selection of tartan and fabric, making them the ideal alternative to a kilt.

name: Breeks
description: Luxury traditional Scottish Breeks, ideal for country wear. Available in tweed and moleskin, these are the perfect addition to any wardrobe.

name: Trews
description: A wonderful alternative to the kilt; our trousers and trews are made to measure and available in your choice of tartan.

name: Trousers
description: Made-to-measure luxury trousers for every occasion and to suit every budget. Available in a wide range of tartans, the perfect alternative to a kilt or for on that golf course.

name: Waistcoats
description: Our waistcoats and vests are available in an extensive variety of sizes, colours and fabrics. Choose from either pre-sized or made-to-measure for the perfect fit.

name: Women
description: A beautiful collection of the finest traditional and contemporary Scottish ladies wear. Carefully crafted using tweeds, tartans, cashmere and other quality materials.

name: Bags & Purses
description: We offer a wide range of bags, purses and cases to accessorise your outfits. Available in thousands of tartans.

name: Bags
description: A collection of stylish, practical bags and wallets available in beautiful tweeds and a wide range of tartans.

name: Capes
description: The perfect cover-up to keep you warm.

name: Dresses
description: Tartan dresses available in any tartan.

name: Garters
description: The perfect touch of heritage to add to your wedding day.

name: Gloves
description: Luxury gloves. Keep your hands warm this winter with cashmere gloves.

name: Head Wear
description: Our range of head wear includes beautiful, luxurious cashmere hats. We also offer a range of tams which come in the tartan of your choice.

name: Knitwear
description: A collection of finest knitwear for women. Luxury sweaters and cardigans made from pure new wool, lambswool and cashmere.

name: Leisurewear
description: Our premium range of leisurewear, including stylish T-shirts and hoodies - many available in personalised tartans or featuring your clan crest. Perfect for comfort and unique expression, our collection blends quality and tradition with a modern twist.

name: Plaids
description: The fly plaid is a formal accessory worn over the shoulder and held in place by your choice of badge, brooch or pin.

name: Ponchos
description: Our practical and comfortable ponchos are available in a wide range of tartans.

name: Sashes
description: Accessorise with a splash of historic drama, for the most formal of occasions. Beautiful sashes for women available in a wide variety of tartans.

name: Scarves
description: Our luxury scarves for women will keep you (or your loved ones) cosy and warm all year round. Made from wool or cashmere, and available in a wide range of tartans or plains.

name: Serapes
description: Our serapes come in a wide variety of tartans. An ideal wrap for both formal occasions and everyday comfort.

name: Shawls
description: Shawls to complement every outfit. Available in thousands of tartans. Add a touch of Scottish flair to your day.

name: Skirts and Kilts
description: Our skirts, and women's kilts are expertly tailored using the finest tartans and tweeds.

name: Socks & Footwear
description: Women’s luxury Scottish socks available in quality cashmere and merino wool. Perfect for lounge wear with a touch of luxury, or for country wear with a touch of style.

name: Stoles
description: A stole is worn over or round the shoulders for a touch of simple elegance. Available in a stunning choice of tartan or pure Scottish cashmere.

name: Gifts
description: Whether you're looking for a gift or something to treat yourself.

name: Necklaces & Pendants
description: Elegant necklaces and pendants.

name: Dining
description: Dining accessories and tableware.
